title: Support looking for adc main
body:
Hi guys,

I  am support curently in silver 2 looking for a non toxic adc main.
I would like to get back to gold where I was before. I play mostly taric and leona once in a while. Love to play with tristana, kalista and varus but really, anyone you want to play is fine for me. Add ne in game "chazar". Looking for somebody who does not take everything too serious, who is optimistic and does not start crying after a loss or if it is 3:0 after 10 mins. 

Voice communication is not needed.

Cheers

replies.body: Yo, i dont know if you're still looking, but Im a kalista main looking to get better. Im currently level 23 but i queue norm summoners with my silver 3 friend. Leona would make a good sup, im not generally too toxic unless we're versing a teemo adc or draven {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Hey man, would love to play with you, and i even have voice comms too if that's better!
im b3 slowly climbing and im way better than any silver adc and also i wish i was in silver :(
Really? Add me I have yet to see a okay ADC let alone a better ADC in bronze. I main support.
